languages.text: {n}Друкари заходится в издевательском хохоте.{/n} "А ведь ты почти обманул{mf||а} меня, {name}! Почти заставил{mf||а} считать себя... чем-то. Что ж, ты развеял{mf||а} эту иллюзию — и мне нечего тебе больше сказать".

{n}Marazhai bursts into contemptuous laughter.{/n} "You almost had me convinced, {name}! You almost made me think you were... something. Well, you have shattered that illusion now — and I have nothing more to say to you."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари заходится в издевательском хохоте.{/n} "А ведь ты почти обманул{mf||а} меня, {name}! Почти заставил{mf||а} считать себя... чем-то. Что ж, ты развеял{mf||а} эту иллюзию — и мне нечего тебе больше сказать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai bursts into contemptuous laughter.{/n} "You almost had me convinced, {name}! You almost made me think I was... something. Well, you have shattered that illusion now — and I have nothing more to say to you."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai estalla en una risotada de desprecio.{/n} «¡Casi me convences, {name}! Casi me haces pensar que eras... algo. Pero has roto esa ilusión y no tengo nada más que decirte».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai bursts into contemptuous laughter.{/n} "You almost had me convinced, {name}! You almost made me think you were... something. Well, you have shattered that illusion now — and I have nothing more to say to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai estalla en una risotada de desprecio.{/n} «¡Casi me convences, {name}! Casi me haces pensar que eras... algo. Pero has roto esa ilusión y no tengo nada más que decirte».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋爆发出鄙夷的大笑声。{/n}“我差点就信了你，{name}！你差点让我以为你……和他们都不一样。很好，你已经打破了我的幻想，我也没什么话要对你说了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai bursts into contemptuous laughter.{/n} "You almost had me convinced, {name}! You almost made me think you were... something. Well, you have shattered that illusion now — and I have nothing more to say to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋爆发出鄙夷的大笑声。{/n}“我差点就信了你，{name}！你差点让我以为你……和他们都不一样。很好，你已经打破了我的幻想，我也没什么话要对你说了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは馬鹿にするように笑う。{/n}「もう少しで騙されるところだっぞ、{name}！お前はもっと…骨のあるやつだと思ってた。まぁ、お前は幻想を粉々に砕いてくれた。俺にはもう、何も言うことはない」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai bursts into contemptuous laughter.{/n} "You almost had me convinced, {name}! You almost made me think you were... something. Well, you have shattered that illusion now — and I have nothing more to say to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは馬鹿にするように笑う。{/n}「もう少しで騙されるところだっぞ、{name}！お前はもっと…骨のあるやつだと思ってた。まぁ、お前は幻想を粉々に砕いてくれた。俺にはもう、何も言うことはない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire méprisant.{/n} « Vous aviez presque réussi à me convaincre, {name} ! Je commençais à croire que vous étiez vraiment... digne de mon intérêt. Mais par ces quelques mots, vous venez de briser cette illusion et je n'ai plus rien à vous dire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai bursts into contemptuous laughter.{/n} "You almost had me convinced, {name}! You almost made me think you were... something. Well, you have shattered that illusion now — and I have nothing more to say to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire méprisant.{/n} « Vous aviez presque réussi à me convaincre, {name} ! Je commençais à croire que vous étiez vraiment... digne de mon intérêt. Mais par ces quelques mots, vous venez de briser cette illusion et je n'ai plus rien à vous dire. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht verächtlich auf.{/n} "Fast hättet Ihr mich überzeugt, {name}! Fast hättet Ihr mich glauben lassen, Ihr wäret ... etwas. Aber diese Illusion habt Ihr nun zertrümmert, und ich habe Euch nichts mehr zu sagen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai bursts into contemptuous laughter.{/n} "You almost had me convinced, {name}! You almost made me think you were... something. Well, you have shattered that illusion now — and I have nothing more to say to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht verächtlich auf.{/n} "Fast hättet Ihr mich überzeugt, {name}! Fast hättet Ihr mich glauben lassen, Ihr wäret ... etwas. Aber diese Illusion habt Ihr nun zertrümmert, und ich habe Euch nichts mehr zu sagen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai bursts into contemptuous laughter.{/n} "You almost had me convinced, ! You almost made me think you were... something. Well, you have shattered that illusion now — and I have nothing more to say to you."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tiksindirici bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Az daha ikna oluyordum {name}! Az daha sende bir cevher var sanıyordum. Eh, neyin ne olduğunu görmüş olduk. Sana diyecek başka sözüm yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai bursts into contemptuous laughter.{/n} "You almost had me convinced, {name}! You almost made me think you were... something. Well, you have shattered that illusion now — and I have nothing more to say to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, tiksindirici bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Az daha ikna oluyordum {name}! Az daha sende bir cevher var sanıyordum. Eh, neyin ne olduğunu görmüş olduk. Sana diyecek başka sözüm yok."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
